detaileddescription.para: Split shell command line into a list of arguments. Aims to emulate bash and friends.

listitem.para: Extra whitespace at the beginning and end and between arguments will be ignored

The backslash \ is used as escape character
Outside quotes, any character can be escaped
Within double quotes, only escape " and backslashes before a \c " or another backslash
Within single quotes, no escaping is possible and no special interpretation takes place

parameterdescription.para: Parsed arguments will be appended to this list
